title: Fixed Income Securities
description: Description, institutional features, and mathematical modeling of fixed income securities.  Use of both deterministic and stochastic models. Crosslisted with ISYE 6769.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MGT 6060 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MGT 6078 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
